short_summary: 5.15 Intermediate Technical Clerk and Junior Technical Clerk Services
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for an Intermediate Technical Clerk and a Junior Technical Clerk for the Directorate of Maritime Management and Support (Management Information System) (DMMS (MIS)) to manage its technical and material-numerical data. This is a technical support or help desk services
full_summary:
# TSPS 5.15 Intermediate Technical Clerk and Junior Technical Clerk Services for Directorate of Maritime Management and Support (Management Information System)

## Notice Information

* Title: TSPS 5.15 Intermediate Technical Clerk and Junior Technical Clerk Services for Directorate of Maritime Management and Support (Management Information System)
* Reference Number: CB-5790-73369218
* Solicitation Number: W8482-231301/A
* Publication Date: May 24, 2023
* Closing Date: June 15, 2023 14:00:00 ET
* Amendment Number: 2
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Expired Date Status: Expiré

## Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a qualified Supply Arrangement Holder to provide services for a 5.15 Intermediate Technical Clerk and a 5.15 Junior Technical Clerk for the Directorate of Maritime Management and Support (Management Information System) (DMMS (MIS)). The requirement includes two (2) resources: one (1) 5.15 Technical Clerk - Intermediate and one (1) 5.15 Technical Clerk - Junior. The estimated level of effort for this contract is 240 days per resource.

## Associated Agreements

This requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada – Chile Free Trade agreement
* Canada – Colombia Free Trade agreement
* Canada – Honduras Free Trade agreement
* Canada – Panama Free Trade agreement
* Canada – Peru Free Trade agreement
* Canada – Ukraine Free Trade agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Requirements

The contractor must ensure that personnel and organization security screening or security clauses are met, as outlined in Industrial security and controlled goods at Public Services and Procurement Canada - Canada.ca.

## Bidding

Qualified suppliers are invited to submit proposals, and the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the selected suppliers.
